Good Comments: The best Sailor Moon subs, hands down. Great quality in everything.
Great quality subs, in both translation and format.
just awesome
The best Sailor Moon version(s) you'll ever get your hands on!
I loved how they color-coded the subs, and they had the best quality of any other fansub! The only issue I had was the fact that they took out honorifics.
I'm very impressed. This has to be considered one of the best fansubs ever.

Great everything! THE best right now.

Self-proclaimed fans that seem to hate honorifics. I'll watch this over Commie any day.
The best quality translating this anime instead of Commie Fansub
Their bluray release has been properly retranslated and is much better compared to other options. If you wrote them off before, give them a 2nd chance.
